title: Exploring hybrid seawater electrolysis with anodic oxidation reactions (AORs): recent progress and prospects
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01191K, Review Article
Baghendra Singh, Ayusie Goyal, Shalini Verma, Labham Singh, Apparao Draksharapu
The hybrid seawater electrolysis with various anodic oxidation reactions has been reviewed.
